thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Bob Isherwood
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Bob Isherwood

author: Bob Isherwood
title: Bob Isherwood
text:
I have used BangGood for a number of years and have only recently had a problem with an undelivered order.
When I contacted the Customer Service team they asked me to wait a little longer but when it still did not arrive they arranged a replacement order to be sent which I have now received Well Done great service !!
